resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107729</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107729</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Growing Slime Mold</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wachsende Schlamm-Form</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moule Croissant de Boue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Molde Crescente Do Slime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Muffa Crescente Della Melma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυξανόμενη slime φόρμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Molde Creciente Del Limo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a short activity for growing the slime mold Physarum polycephalum. It includes materials needed, a three-step procedure, and helpful tips. The site is part of the Turbulent Landscapes exhibit at the Exploratorium. Links to other activities and features of the exhibit are also included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine kurze Aktivität für das Wachsen 
des Schlammform Physarum polycephalum. Es schließt die 
benötigten Materialien, eine dreistufige Prozedur und nützliche 
Spitzen ein. Die Site ist ein Teil der turbulenten 
Landschaftsausstellung beim Exploratorium. Links zu anderen 
Aktivitäten und Merkmale der Ausstellung sind auch eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité courte pour accroître le 
polycephalum de Physarum de moule de boue. Elle inclut des 
matériaux requis, un procédé en trois étapes, et des extrémités 
utiles. Le site fait partie de l'objet exposé turbulent 
d'horizontaux chez l'Exploratorium. Des liens à d'autres 
activités et les dispositifs de l'objet exposé sont également 
inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade curta para crescer o 
polycephalum de Physarum do molde do slime. Inclui os materiais 
necessitados, um procedimento three-step, e pontas úteis. O 
local é parte da exibição turbulent das paisagens no Exploratorium.
As ligações a outras atividades e as características da 
exibição são incluídas também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività corta per la crescita del 
polycephalum di Physarum della muffa della melma. Include i 
materiali stati necessari, una procedura in tre tappe e le punte 
utili. Il luogo fa parte dell'esposizione turbolenta di paesaggi
al Exploratorium. I collegamenti ad altre attività e le 
caratteristiche dell'esposizione egualmente sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια σύντομη δραστηριότητα για την ανάπτυξη
του slime polycephalum Physarum φορμών. Περιλαμβάνει 
τα υλικά που απαιτούνται, μια σε τρία στάδια διαδικασία, και τις 
χρήσιμες άκρες. Η περιοχή είναι μέρος του ταραχώδους 
εκθέματος τοπίων στο Exploratorium. Οι συνδέσεις με άλλα 
δραστηριότητες και χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα του εκθέματος 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad corta para crecer el 
polycephalum de Physarum del molde del limo. Incluye materiales 
necesitados, un procedimiento three-step, y extremidades provechosas. 
El sitio es parte del objeto expuesto turbulento de los paisajes
en el Exploratorium. Las conexiones a otras actividades y las 
características del objeto expuesto también se incluyen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:EXPLORATORIUM
FN:EXPLORATORIUM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107729</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/growing-slime-mold</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
